resources.string: Don\'t let the enemy tiles reach the bottom! Enemy tiles will randomly fall from the top of the grid. Luckily you have five types of tiles that will randomly generate as well! All player tile actions will activate on collision with an enemy tile. In addition to destroying the enemy tile it collides with, each player tile has a unique function.
The Sword tile destroys any enemy tiles in the two squares above the collision.
The Great Sword tile destroys enemy tiles in the four swuares above the collision.
The Dagger tile destroys enemy tiles in the squares to the left and right of the collision
The Bishop tile destroys enemy tiles in the squares to the top-left and top-right of the collision.
The Bomb tile destroys all enemy tiles that are adjacent to it, but not below it.
